about_the_game:
In this dangerous world, you will play as a lonely elf facing an endless tide of enemies. You have only one goal: to survive.

Main features:

1. Stressful survival experience:

Faced with an endless stream of enemies, every second is a matter of life and death. How long can you last in this brutal game of survival?

Unique upgrade system:

Unlock powerful ability upgrades as experience points are accumulated. Each level up makes you stronger, but the enemies also become more challenging.

Diverse enemies:

From ordinary pursuers to long-range shooters, each enemy requires a different strategy to deal with.

4. Dynamic difficulty adjustment:

The game dynamically adjusts the difficulty based on your performance, ensuring that every moment is challenging without being frustrating.

Random item system:

Collect random items that may save your life at a crucial moment.

6. Well-designed sound effects and music:

Immersive sound effects and intense background music allow you to fully immerse yourself in this dangerous world.

7. Simple and in-depth operation:

Easy to learn, but it takes a long time to really master. Every game is a new challenge and an opportunity to learn.

8. Multi-language support:

Support English, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, German, Italian and Russian, so that global players can enjoy the fun of the game.

How long can you survive in this dangerous world? Every game is a new adventure, and every second is full of tension and excitement. Are you up for a challenge?

name: 精灵幸存者 Elf Survivor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better

short_description: Elf Survivor is a challenging 2D survival action game. Players will struggle to survive in a dangerous world, facing a constant stream of enemies.
supported_languages: English, Italian, German, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean
